original_text: The governor told them that they were not to partake of the most holy food until a priest with Urim and Thummim should arise.
korean_text: 총독이 그들에게 명령하여 우림과 둠밈을 가진 제사장이 일어나기 전에는 지성물을 먹지 말라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: that they were not to partake of the most holy food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가장 거룩한 음식을 먹어서는 안 된다고

sentences.original_text: until a priest with Urim and Thummim should arise.
sentences.korean_translation: 우림과 둠밈을 가진 제사장이 나타날 때까지는.
